content: Just finished a draft of my AI conference presentation. It's not just about showing off tech; it's about sparking a conversation on how AI can be a force for good, not just profit.
Got some valuable feedback on my recovery strategy from my mentor. He says, "Learn from every fall, but also learn to stand up with grace." It's a balance between ambition and humility.
Had a moment of clarity while working on the neural interface. If we're optimizing for speed, what about fairness? Had a virtual chat with my mentor; he's encouraging me to explore this angle.
